exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: Nutriota Silicea/Silicon 250 mg capsules provide high-quality silica from bamboo extract. This essential trace element is popular for promoting the growth of skin, hair and nails. As our body's ability to produce silicon decreases with age, supplementation helps maintain optimal levels. Each bottle contains 120 capsules manufactured in a GMP-compliant production facility.
descriptionContent: Nutriota Silicea offers 250 mg of silica per capsule sourced from bamboo stem extract. Silicon is an essential trace element that supports healthy skin, hair, and nail growth. Many women and men use silica supplements to enhance their natural beauty and support connective tissue health. With 120 capsules per bottle, this supplement provides a convenient way to maintain your silicon levels as the body's natural production declines with age.
ingredientsContent: Bamboo stem extract (Bambusa vulgaris), capsule shell [coating agent (hydroxypropylmethylcellulose)]
informationContent: Units: 54.4 gram | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Capsule | Age Range Description: Adult
